{"name": "DMV Food Justice Initiative", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Fill out this [**grocery delivery request form**](https://www.foodjusticedmv.org/contact) or **text** this number (202) 415-9757 details of the delivery request.


", "email": "", "url": "www.foodjusticedmv.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3110 Chichester Lane", "address_2": null, "city": "Fairfax", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "22031", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.864437, "longitude": -77.248423}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 415-9757", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Fill out the form on their website for assistance"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
